text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Let's keep this straight! The COVID-19 VIRUS wants to live-It has a NEED to survive-it's just waiting for an opportunity to keep on living! The opportunity it's looking for is a crowd-a large group of people to infect... so IT CAN LIVE!! Why are you @realDonaldTrump helping it?🤔
